data.text: @ArisDama Olá Aris, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@AlexCissokho Hello Alex, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@NatyRibeiroBr Hello Naty,
We have already answered your private messages. Thank you
@elrincondesaan1 Hello Sandy, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@parisaveclauren Hello Lauren,
May you please provide us your booking code via DM?

@krystiak Krystia,
All the efforts are being made to conclude this case ans you will let you know as soon as possible.

@lynnziemm Hello Lynnzie,
May you please let us know your complaint number via DM?

@AmsDarian Hello Darian,
We sincerely apologize for the waiting time.
We assure you that your case is being taken care of and you will be contacted as soon as possible.
We appreciate your understanding.

@krystiak Hello Krystia,
We sincerely apologize for the waiting time. However, we are still holding for an answer from our partner airline.
The case will be solved as soon as possible and you will be contacted then.
We appreciate your understanding and patience.

@toodlestweeter For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message.
Thank you. (2/2)

@DosSant69520 Bonjour Dos Santos,
Comment pouvons-nous vous aider?

@alexandredupe_ Hello Alexandre,
We have replied to your private message. Thank you

@RubenRCarlos Olá Ruben,
Informamos que respondemos já à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@LukePassmore7 Luke,
We reiterate the information already provided and kindly request that you wait for the feedback. Thank you

@zainsurgent Olá Gabriela,
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@LukePassmore7 Hello Luke,
We understand the situation and confirm that your case is still under analysis. As soon as we have any updates, you will be directly contacted. Therefore, we kindly request that you wait. Thank you

@BustaFlow Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted by email very soon. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.
@nualammaher Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your booking reference or electronic ticket number. Thank you in advance.

@soototallyjord Hello Jordan,

can you inform us through DM the booking refences or electronic ticket numbers (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@ValeriaUD Hello Maria,

can you inform us through DM your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? Thank you.
@Laaki75 Thank you. We have replied to your DM.
@stephhuin Nous attendons votre message pour pouvoir donner suite à votre demande. Merci.
@AguRamirezJ Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your claim number and the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance.

@stephhuin Bonsoir! Nous sommes désolés pour tout désagrément causé. Afin de vérifier la situation, veuillez nous envoyer un message direct avec le numéro de dossier et l'adresse mail associée. Merci d'avance.
@AsikainenElina You're welcome. We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance.
@Laaki75 Bonsoir! Afin de vérifier la situation, veuillez nous envoyer un message direct avec les données de votre dossier. Merci d'avance.
@Laaki75 @esolidar Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your booking information. Thank you in advance.

@melrosita @tapportugal Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused by the cancellation of your flight. If our assistance is still required, please DM us your booking information. Thank you in advance.
@DJ_Heilan Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. If our assistance is still needed, please DM us your booking information. Thank you in advance.
@con72 @AntonioCenoura Hi! The form is available using the following link - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @golgoli131 Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. We have replied via DM. Thank you in advance.

@hxwardwork For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.  
Thank you.

@YuriColombi Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused by the cancellation of your flight. If our assistance is still needed, please DM us your booking details. Thank you in advance.

@LauraMisina To verify, however, please confirm us your complaint number and the email address associated to it. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest sending the details by DM.
Thank you.
@diegojatem @IATA Hello Diego, we apologize for the delay on handling your case and inform you that we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

domain.description: Brands and Companies

data.text:
@Mellinghoff Hello Michael,
on the main page of our website, you have the option to insert the route and date and proceed with your flight search. 
If you need any further assistance, please let us know. 
Thank you.
@dominikjaeger Thank you for your understanding. (1/3)

@dominikjaeger We guarantee it deserves our best attention and has not been forgotten. 
In the meantime, if there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know.(1/2)

@dominikjaeger Hello Dominik,
We apologize for the delay on answering your process. We would like to inform that every complaint is carefully analyzed and its analysis may take more or less time, depending on the complexity of the situation and the necessity to verify with other departments.1/3

@Nathann_paim @RobertaQueirooz @gruairportsp Olá Nathan,
Lamentamos a situação. Para que seja possível verificar, sugerimos que nos indique o seu código de reserva. 
Por razões de confidencialidade de dados, sugerimos o envio dos mesmos através de DM.
Obrigada.

@mourecassidy Olá Mcmardigan,
lamentamos, desde já, qualquer inconveniente causado.
Para verificar, pedimos que nos indique, por favor, o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico. Por motivos de segurança/confidencialidade, sugerimos o envio dos dados por DM.

Obrigado ✈️

@helo_flemos Olá helozinh,
lamentamos, desde já, qualquer dificuldade e inconveniente experienciado.
A situação está a ser verificada; assim que tivermos mais informação, retomaremos o contacto.

Obrigado.

@Erika461865632 Hello Erika,
we are truly sorry for the inconvenience the situation may cause you. 
To verify, please confirm us your booking reference or ticket number; for confidentiality reasons, we suggest sending the data by DM.

Thank you ✈️

@beolabs Hello beolabs.io@beolabs we sincerely apologize for the distress caused.
If assistance is still needed, please send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message so we may verify. Thank you.

@Blink_Insomnia0 Bonsoir Once-insomnia,
Pour vérifier la situation, veuillez nos indiquer votre code de réservation ou le numéro de billet.  
Pour des raisons de confidentialité, nous vous suggérons d'envoyer ces informations par message privé.  
Merci.

@AntonioCenoura Hello Antonio,
You may find the claim form on our website's contacts page. Thank you

@daniromeromonte Hello Daniela,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high amount of messages received it was not possible to answer any sooner. We inform you that we have already answered your private message. Thank you
@pizzingrilliMu Por questões de segurança e proteção dos seus dados, solicitamos que efetue o envio dos mesmos através de uma mensagem privada. Obrigada (3/3)

@pizzingrilliMu Para que nos seja possível verificar a sua questão, solicitamos que nos indique o número do processo de irregularidade referente à sua bagagem. Este código (PIR) contem as 3 letras referentes ao aeroporto de chegada, seguido de TP e números posteriormente (exemplo: LISTP12345).

@pizzingrilliMu Olá Murilo,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas não nos foi possível responder de forma mais célere. (1/3)
@CuignetE Hello cuignet, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@RubenRCarlos Olá Ruben,
Lamentamos a situação que nos reporta. Para que nos seja possível ajudar por esta via, solicitamos que nos encaminhe os dados da sua reclamação, através de uma mensagem privada, por motivos de segurança. Obrigada

@Drgilita Hello M,
We apologize for the situation you have mentioned. We have already answered to your private messages. Thank you

@Alanlen80 Hello Alan,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/2)
@GhislainVachero For security reasons and data protection, we advise you to send the details through a private message. Thank you (2/2)

@GhislainVachero Hello Ghislain,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. In order for us to be able to check about your question, we kindly request that you provide us with the booking reference. (1/2)

@Maggie247 Hello Maggie, 
Please provide us the booking reference. For security reasons, we kindly request that you send the information through a private message. Thank you

data.text: @c1othes11 Hello Kevin, we replied by private message. Thank you.
@JucasRomeiro Olá Lucas, pode indicar-nos o código de reserva, por favor? Por questões de segurança, sugerimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@janeruffino May you inform through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@p_abloc Pablo,

nos podría informar por mensaje privado su número de proceso de reclamación y dirección de correo electrónico asociada, para que podamos verificar, por favor? Gracias.

@janeruffino Hello Janesaw,

We understand your situation. You may fill a complaint form through the link https://t.co/3nTBK3gGcK . After the form filled, we kindly ask you to wait for our Customer Service's feedback, in order to verify your case. Thank you.

We apologize for the delay in our answer. Also, we apologize for the described situation. Please let us know how may we assist you through this channel. Thank you

@p_abloc Hola Pablo,
Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, le pedimos que nos indique su número de reclamo. Por cuestión de seguridad, le pedimos que haga el envío a través de un mensaje privado. Gracias

@MartinIssleib Hello Martin,
we have replied via Facebook. Thank you.

data.text: We advise our customers who receive this message to delete it without clicking on the link.

data.text:
WARNING - PHISHING SCHEME
TAP informs that some customers are receiving fraudulent notifications via e-mail, stating that they are entitled to receive compensation due to a delayed flight. This notification redirects to a link that is a fraud scheme. https://t.co/tRNezKdX1u

data.text: Aconselhamos aos nossos clientes que recebem esta mensagem a eliminá-la sem clicar na ligação.

AVISO - ESQUEMA DE PHISHING
A TAP informa que alguns clientes estão a receber notificações fraudulentas via e-mail, referindo que têm direito a receber uma indemnização devido a um voo atrasado. Esta notificação redireciona para uma ligação que é um esquema de fraude. https://t.co/MFmXlmdqAB
